description: Shimla, Manali, Kufri, Solang Valley, Kasol, Manikaran, Chandigarh
activities: Day 1: Arrival and sightseeing in Shimla
Day 2: Visit Kufri and Jakhoo Temple
Day 3: Travel to Manali, explore local market
Day 5: Visit Kasol and Manikaran Sahib
Day 6: Travel to Chandigarh, Rock Garden tour
instructions: Carry warm clothes, ID proof, and necessary medications

description: Srinagar, Gulmarg, Pahalgam, Sonmarg, Dal Lake
activities: Day 1: Arrival in Srinagar, Shikara ride on Dal Lake
Day 2: Explore Mughal Gardens and Shankaracharya Temple
Day 3: Visit Gulmarg, enjoy Gondola ride
Day 4: Drive to Pahalgam, explore Betaab Valley
Day 5: Trip to Sonmarg, enjoy Thajiwas Glacier trek
Day 6: Leisure day for shopping and local cuisine
instructions: Carry warm clothes, ID proof, and cash for local purchases

description: Baga Beach, Anjuna, Dudhsagar Waterfalls, Fort Aguada
activities: Day 1: Arrival in Goa, evening at Baga Beach
Day 2: Explore Anjuna and Vagator beaches
Day 3: Visit Dudhsagar Waterfalls and spice plantation
Day 4: Sightseeing at Fort Aguada and Panjim city
inclusions: Hotel stay, breakfast, bike rental, guide
instructions: Carry swimwear, sunscreen, and beach essentials

activities: Day 1: Arrival in Jaipur, visit Amber Fort
Day 2: Explore City Palace, Hawa Mahal, and Jantar Mantar
Day 3: Travel to Jodhpur, visit Mehrangarh Fort
Day 4: Explore Umaid Bhawan Palace, Mandore Gardens
Day 5: Travel to Udaipur, boat ride at Lake Pichola
Day 6: Visit City Palace, Jagdish Temple, and Fateh Sagar Lake
Day 7: Travel to Jaisalmer, explore sand dunes
Day 8: Camel safari and cultural night in Jaisalmer
inclusions: Hotel stay, breakfast, transport, cultural shows
instructions: Carry light clothing, ID proof, and cash for shopping

description: Delhi, Agra, Jaipur - India's classic heritage circuit
activities: Day 1: Arrival in Delhi - Red Fort & Chandni Chowk exploration
Day 2: Delhi sightseeing - Qutub Minar, India Gate, Lotus Temple
Day 3: Drive to Agra - Sunrise at Taj Mahal, Agra Fort visit
Day 4: Fatehpur Sikri enroute to Jaipur - Evening markets
Day 5: Jaipur - Amber Fort, City Palace, Hawa Mahal
Day 6: Jantar Mantar visit before departure
inclusions: 5-star hotels, breakfast buffet, AC transport, expert guide, monument entries
instructions: Carry comfortable shoes, camera, valid ID proofs. Dress modestly for monuments.

description: Alleppey, Munnar, Thekkady - God's Own Country
activities: Day 1: Kochi arrival - Fort Kochi & Chinese fishing nets
Day 2: Drive to Munnar - Tea plantation tour
Day 3: Munnar - Eravikulam National Park, Mattupetty Dam
Day 4: Thekkady - Spice plantation, Periyar lake cruise
Day 5: Alleppey - Houseboat check-in, backwater cruise
Day 6: Alleppey - Village walk, canoe ride
inclusions: Premium houseboat, resort stays, all meals on houseboat, Ayurvedic welcome kit
instructions: Pack light cotton clothes, mosquito repellent. Bring swimwear for resort pools.

description: Leh, Nubra Valley, Pangong Lake - Land of high passes
activities: Day 2: Leh - Shanti Stupa, Leh Palace, local market
Day 3: Nubra Valley - Khardung La pass, double-humped camels
Day 4: Nubra - Diskit Monastery, sand dunes
Day 5: Pangong Lake - Chang La pass, overnight at lakeside
Day 6: Leh return - Hemis Monastery visit
Day 7: Leh - Thiksey Monastery, Shey Palace
inclusions: Homestays & camps, oxygen cylinders, Ladakhi guide, all permits
instructions: Carry warm layers (even in summer), sunglasses, altitude medication if required.

description: Port Blair, Havelock, Neil Island - Coral paradise
activities: Day 1: Port Blair - Cellular Jail light & sound show
Day 4: Neil Island - Natural bridge, Bharatpur Beach
Day 5: Port Blair - Ross Island, Chidiya Tapu
inclusions: Beach resorts, speedboat transfers, snorkeling gear, buffet breakfasts
instructions: Essential: Swimwear, waterproof phone case, reef-safe sunscreen.

description: Jaipur, Udaipur, Jodhpur - Land of kings
activities: Day 1: Jaipur - Amber Fort elephant ride
Day 2: Jaipur - City Palace, Jantar Mantar
Day 3: Bikaner - Junagarh Fort, camel research center
Day 4: Jaisalmer - Golden Fort, desert camp
Day 5: Jaisalmer - Sam sand dunes safari
Day 6: Jodhpur - Mehrangarh Fort, blue city walk
Day 7: Udaipur - City Palace boat ride
inclusions: Heritage hotels, folk performances, desert camp dinner, private guides
instructions: Evenings can be cool - carry light jacket. Bargain in markets.

inclusions: Trek permits, certified guide, camping equipment, vegetarian meals
instructions: Must have trekking shoes. Carry rain gear. Physical fitness required.

description: North & South Goa - Sun, sand and seafood
activities: Day 1: North Goa - Baga beach, night market

Day 3: South Goa - Palolem beach, dolphin spotting
inclusions: Beachfront cottages, bike rental, seafood dinner, airport transfers
instructions: Carry beach essentials, Euros accepted in some shops.

activities: Day 2: Sunrise boat ride, temple circuit
inclusions: Boutique ghat hotel, boat rides, guide, all rituals participation
instructions: Remove shoes at temples. No photography during ceremonies.

activities: Day 3: Cherrapunji - Living root bridges trek
inclusions: Eco lodges, tribal meals, permits, expert naturalists
instructions: Carry rain gear year-round. Respect tribal customs.

activities: Day 4: Coorg - Abbey Falls, Tibetan settlement
inclusions: Plantation stays, breakfast, cultural shows, entry fees
instructions: Light woolens for Coorg evenings. Try local coffee.

description: Tea gardens & Himalayan views - Queen of Hills
activities: Day 2: Darjeeling - Toy train, tea estate
inclusions: Boutique hotels, permit fees, guide, all transfers
instructions: Carry warm clothes. Limited ATMs - carry cash.

inclusions: Jungle lodges, expert trackers, all safaris, conservation fees

inclusions: Temple stays available, traditional meals, guide

description: Ahmedabad, Dwarka, Rann of Kutch - Vibrant Gujarat
inclusions: Cultural performances, handicraft demos, local transport

description: Amritsar, Chandigarh - Land of gurus & warriors
inclusions: Gurudwara stay option, langar meal, all entry fees
